original_title: Ambulatório Através da Poesia de Augusto dos Anjos e António Nobre
overview: A decadent and symbolist Portuguese poet, António Nobre died of tuberculosis at the age of 32 (1900), having published only one book (Só, 1892). A symbolist Brazilian poet, Augusto dos Anjos died of pneumonia at the age of 30 (1914), having published only one book (Eu, 1912).
title: Ambulatory Through the Poetry of Augusto dos Anjos and António Nobre
